divs: Sighting Detailsme and my husband was sitting by our parents pond fishing and it is a clear night full moon only a few stars and next thing we see in the sky from a close distance is something red and flashing and it got closer and stopped above us slowly moving close enough where we seen the shape. it was shaped of a huge triangle opened up in the center with nothing but red flashing lights in the middle. then it started going over the top of us into the neighbors field slowly and disappeared in the sky.
trends: There have been no other sightings in St. James
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
Summary: looked like a space ship out of the start track triangle in shape with red flashing orb like lights
